response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. This item holds significant worth to us at $1,500,000, reflecting its quality, rarity, and potential impact. Considering its immense value to you at $1,000,000, I propose a transaction that benefits both parties. I kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product for an offer of $1,200,000. This price not only represents a fair compromise between our values but also ensures a profitable outcome for us. Should you be interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
